en: Rejoice in Jehovah, O ye righteous: Praise is comely for the upright.
hmr: Aw mi felhai, LALPAA chun hlimin hla sak ro, Mi indik ta ding chun Pathien inpâk hi a âwm hrim a nih.

en: Give thanks unto Jehovah with the harp: Sing praises unto him with the psaltery of ten strings.
hmr: Ṭingṭangin LALPA kuoma chun lâwmthu hril unla, Perkhuong hrui sâwm nei mi leh ama inpâkin hla sak ro.

en: Sing unto him a new song; Play skilfully with a loud noise.
hmr: Ama chawimawiin hla thar sak unla, Ri nasatak leh thiemtakin sut ro.

en: For the word of Jehovah is right; And all his work is done in faithfulness.
hmr: LALPA thu chu ân dik a, A thilthaw po po chu ringum- taka thaw a ni si hlak a.

en: He loveth righteousness and justice: The earth is full of the lovingkindness of Jehovah.
hmr: Felna le rorêlna fel hi a ngaina hlak a; Leihnuoi hi LALPA ngilneinain a sip a.

en: By the word of Jehovah were the heavens made, And all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
hmr: LALPA thuin vânhai chu siem a na, Chuonga umhai po po khawm chu a baua thuok chun siem an ni bawk a.

en: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as a heap: He layeth up the deeps in store-houses.
hmr: Ama chun tuisuoriet tuihai chu iengkhat siekhâwm thûr angin a sukkhâwm a, Tui inthûktakhai chu siekhâwm- na inahai a sieṭha hlak.

en: Let all the earth fear Jehovah: Let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
hmr: Leihnuoi hluo po pohai chun LALPA chu ṭî hai sienla, Khawvêla um po pohai chu ama ṭiin um raw se.

en: For he spake, and it was done; He commanded, and it stood fast.
hmr: Ama chun a hril a, a hung um tah a, Thu a pêk a, a hung det ta sih a.

en: Jehovah bringeth the counsel of the nations to nought; He maketh the thoughts of the peoples to be of no effect.
hmr: LALPAIN hnam tin remruot chu iengkhawm ni loah ân changtir a, Mi tin ngaituohai chu iengkhawm ṭhathnemna nei loin a siem hlak.

en: The counsel of Jehovah standeth fast for ever, The thoughts of his heart to all generations.
hmr: LALPA remruot ruok chu kumkhuoin um det a ta, A lungrila a ngaituohai chu suon po po chenin umdet a tih.

en: Blessed is the nation whose God is Jehovah, The people whom he hath chosen for his own inheritance.
hmr: LALPA Pathiena nei hnam chu an hamṭha a, Ama rochan dinga a thlang mihai chu.

en: Jehovah looketh from heaven; He beholdeth all the sons of men;
hmr: LALPA chun vâna inthawk khin a thlîr a, Mihriem nauhai po po hi a hmu hlak.

en: From the place of his habitation he looketh forth Upon all the inhabitants of the earth,
hmr: Hnuoia um po po hi, A umna hmuna inthawk khin a hung thlîr hlak,

en: He that fashioneth the hearts of them all, That considereth all their works.
hmr: An rênga lungril siem hlak a, An thilthaw po po ngaituo hlaktu chun.

en: There is no king saved by the multitude of a host: A mighty man is not delivered by great strength.
hmr: Lal hrim hrim hi sipaihai tam lei ngawta sandama um an um ngai nawh: Mi hrât hi hrât bêk bêk lei ngawta sanhim an ni ngai nawh.

en: A horse is a vain thing for safety; Neither doth he deliver any by his great power.
hmr: Sakawr hi insanhimna dingin iengkhawm a ni nawh a, A hrât bêk bêk leiin tukhawm sanhim bawk naw nih.

en: Behold, the eye of Jehovah is upon them that fear him, Upon them that hope in his lovingkindness;
hmr: Ngai ta, LALPA mit chu ama ṭîtuhai chunga chun a fu zing hlak a, A ngilneina beiseituhai chunga chun.

en: To deliver their soul from death, And to keep them alive in famine.
hmr: An hringna thinaa inthawka sanhim ding le, Ṭâm tlâk phaa anni tungnung dingin.

en: Our soul hath waited for Jehovah: He is our help and our shield.
hmr: Ei hringna hin LALPA a nghâk zing a, Ama chu mi ṭhangpuitu le ei phaw a nih.

en: For our heart shall rejoice in him, Because we have trusted in his holy name.
hmr: Amaa chun ei lungril hi a hlim ding a nih, A hming inthieng ei ring leiin.

en: Let thy lovingkindness, O Jehovah, be upon us, According as we have hoped in thee.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i ngilneina chu kan chungah um raw se. Kan beisei ang pei chein.
